reviewText:
The demented was better than I thought it would be... these all look wonderful on Blu Ray.

Mimesis was creative enough but seemed to let down at the end.

The Crazies is going to be a legendary epic years later mainly because I don't think it got any notoriety when it was out.

As for the Terror one...  kinda a "B movie" with an interesting modern theme of conspiracy.  Will make you think.
good movie & price for a Zombies 4 in 1 box with 4 disc.
